markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs=""
>
[Fiendish Strikes](/Feats.aspx?ID=1393) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 41 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your festering connection to the forces of evil infuses your weapons with debilitating malevolence, tearing down creatures of good with every attack. All your weapon and unarmed Strikes deal 1 additional evil damage and have the [evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64) and [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) traits.
name: Fiendish Strikes
